mapper.select: SELECT product_id, name, width, depth, height, weight, CASE WHEN is_fragile = 1 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS fragile, category FROM product
SELECT product_id, name, width, depth, height, weight, CASE WHEN is_fragile = 1 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS fragile, category FROM product WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_id, name, width, depth, height, weight, is_fragile, category) VALUES (#{productId}, #{name}, #{width}, #{depth}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{fragile}, #{category})
